amendment.description: To prohibit funds to be used to establish, apply, or enforce certain goals relating to Federal employees and public-private competitions or work force conversions, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 61 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 61 proposed by Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S1355-1357; text: CR S1355) To prohibit funds to be used to establish, apply, or enforce certain goals relating to Federal employees and public-private competitions or work force conversions, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 61 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 61 proposed by Senator Mikulski.
